Iterators

iterator files(dir: DirPath; ext: string; relative: bool): FilePath {...}{.
    raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Yields the files in the directory dir with the extension ext.

ext should not include the separator. Symlinks are not followed.

  Source Edit 
iterator relativeFiles(dir: DirPath; ext: string): RelativeFile {...}{.
    raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Yields the files in the directory dir with the extension ext. The yielded paths are relative.

ext should not include the separator. Symlinks are not followed.

  Source Edit 
iterator absoluteFiles(dir: DirPath; ext: string): AbsoluteFile {...}{.
    raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Yields the files in the directory dir with the extension ext. The yielded paths are absolute.

ext should not include the separator. Symlinks are not followed.

  Source Edit 
iterator filesRec(dir: DirPath; ext: string; relative: bool): FilePath {...}{.
    raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Recursively iterates on the files in the directory dir with the extension ext.

ext should not include the separator. Symlinks are not followed.

  Source Edit 
iterator relativeFilesRec(dir: DirPath; ext: string): RelativeFile {...}{.
    raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Recursively iterates on the files in the directory dir with the extension ext. The yielded paths are relative to dir.

ext should not include the separator. Symlinks are not followed.

  Source Edit 
iterator absoluteFilesRec(dir: DirPath; ext: string): AbsoluteFile {...}{.
    raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Recursively iterates on the files in the directory dir with the extension ext. The yielded paths are absolute.

ext should not include the separator. Symlinks are not followed.

  Source Edit 
iterator relativeNimModules(dir: DirPath): RelativeFile {...}{.raises: [OSError],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Yields the Nim modules in the directory dir. The yielded paths are relative to dir.

Symlinks are not followed.

  Source Edit 
iterator absoluteNimModules(dir: DirPath): AbsoluteFile {...}{.raises: [OSError],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect].}

Yields the Nim modules in the directory dir. The yielded paths are absolute.

Symlinks are not followed.
